description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Discover what has happened on the island, why everyone has disappeared and unveil your destiny.  This is a short narrative game in which you unfold the story by relating ideas to create new ones.
description.short: Discover what has happened on the island, why everyone has disappeared and unveil your destiny.  This is a short narrative game in which you unfold the story by relating ideas to create new ones.
